accommodations.description: Newly built penthouse shared with other students. Includes rooms with options for a single or deluxe single room with a private balcony.

Family arrangements with options of breakfast only or half-board.
Located 15 minutes on public transport from school, with serviced hotel rooms for year-round availability.

terms.cancellation: Special terms for the Holiday Course (16-19 years old): if cancellation occurs before the start of the course, 50% refund; after the course starts, no refund.
terms.refund_policy: Refunds require submission of a written cancellation. ActiLingua retains fees depending on the time of cancellation relative to course start date.
terms.liability: ActiLingua assumes no liability for accidents or illnesses.
terms.payment: Accepted methods include bank transfer or credit card.
terms.general_conditions: General cancellation policies and refund conditions are outlined.

terms.cancellation: Cancellations are accepted in written form only. ActiLingua will make all refunds within 30 working days ONLY to the person or agency that made the payment.
terms.refund_policy: ActiLingua will charge the following cancellation fees for individual bookings: Up to four weeks before the confirmed start of the course: 10% of the total amount but at least EUR 198.
terms.liability: We assume no liability for accidents or illness incurred by the participant during the course.
terms.payment: The balance must be received in our account 20 days before the student’s arrival.
terms.general_conditions: All general conditions of ActiLingua courses are administered per the provided guidelines.
terms.additional_terms: Full payment must be received on time before reserved accommodation is to be checked into.
